SceneDescription.name: An Endless Void
SceneDescription.description:
You stand before an abyss of nothingness, and can't help but feel that the abyss is gazing directly into your soul.
Its whisper is almost inaudible, but you know without a doubt that the message conveyed is "Get back to work."
You see a doorway to your left, no doubt leading back to the mansion's entrance.
